name: Plague Lord

grantsPowers.name: Decay
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Reduce Healing taken; Disease; Expose Punish

grantsPowers.name: Festering Wounds
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Reduce Healing; Disease; Expose on Healing

grantsPowers.name: Touch Of Rot
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Reduce Support Power on last Basic

description: As a host of the most noxious of contaminants, your popularity may ebb and flow as you infect your enemies. The odors and muck you may leave behind will help remind those of your legacy as a plague bearer and a master of the rank and foul, making you one highly feared adversary.
lore: The pandemic: a silent killer that has no prejudice and does not discriminate.
